row.name: PCK.AUTOMIC_AZURE.PRV.PROMPTSET.SAVE_CONNECTION_INFO
row.description: Enter name for the Azure connection

row.xui: <dialog height="424" icon="PRPT" id="PRPTS" left="0" top="0" width="441"><readpanel fill="b" id="PRPTBOX" nl="1" scroll="v" text="Enter name for the Azure connection"><properties><entry name="text">Enter name for the Azure connection</entry><entry name="modifiable">0</entry></properties></readpanel></dialog>

row.name: UC4RB_AZR_CONNECTION_NAME#
row.xui:
<text alt="1" enabled="1" fill="b" focus="0" id="UC4RB_AZR_CONNECTION_NAMEs.00" inputassistance="0" len="" multiline="0" multilineIcon="0" nl="1" regex="[a-zA-Z0-9-_]+" required="0" separator=";" showaspassword="0" text="Connection name" tooltip="Name of the connection. row.name: UC4RB_AZR_OVERWRITE_CONN#
row.xui: <dynradiogroup alt="1" enabled="1" fill="b" focus="" id="UC4RB_AZR_OVERWRITE_CONNs.00" nl="1" text="Overwrite if exist" tooltip="Check this flag to overwrite an existing connection with same name" required="0"> <properties> <entry listparam="C,N" name="reference" reftype="STATIC">PCK.ITPA_SHARED.PRV.VARA.TRUE_FALSE</entry> <entry name="xmlkey"/> <entry name="xmlpath"/> <entry name="text">Overwrite if exist</entry> <entry name="quotes"/> <entry name="id">UC4RB_AZR_OVERWRITE_CONNs.00</entry> <entry name="enabled">0</entry> <entry name="focus">0</entry> <entry name="tooltip">Check this flag to overwrite an existing connection with same name</entry> <entry name="modifiable">1</entry> <entry name="customfield"/> <entry name="initvalue"/> </properties> </dynradiogroup>
